item.title: End WY-22 East at US-26/US-89/US-189/US-191
item.description: End WY-22 East at US-26/US-89/US-189/US-191 in Jackson. Turn left on US-26 East/US-89/US-189/US-191 North to Moran Jct. Turn right on US-26 West/US-89/US-189/US-191 South to Hoback Jct.

item.title: WY-22 East at US-26/US-89/US-189/US-191
item.description: End WY-22 East at US-26/US-89/US-189/US-191. Use US-26 West/US-89/US-189/US-191 South to Hoback Junction. Use US-26 East/US-89/US-189/US-191 North to Moran Junction and Yellowstone - Teton National Parks.

item.title: WY-22 West - Return To Jackson When Flashing
item.description: WY-22 west at the base of Teton Pass. Return to Jackson When Flashing.

item.title: WY-22 West - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on WY-22 west. Distance to (Idaho-Wyoming) State Line and Victor Idaho.

item.title: WY-22 West Approaching Teton Pass
item.description: WY-22 west approaching Teton Pass. Steep Mountain Pass Ahead - 10% Grades.

item.title: WY-22 West at WY-390 North
item.description: WY-22 West at WY-390 North. Turn right for WY-390 north to Teton Village; straight on WY-22 west for Wilson.

item.title: WY-22 West at WY-390
item.description: WY-22 West at WY-390 North to Teton Village. Continue west on WY-22 for Wilson.

item.title: WY-22 West Approaching WY-390
item.description: WY-22 West approaching WY-390 in Wilson. Use WY-390 north for Teton Village Recreation Area.

item.title: WY-22 West - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on WY-22 west. Distance to Wilson, Teton Village (via WY-390) and Idaho Falls (Idaho).

item.title: WY-22 West - Jackson
item.description: WY-22 West in Jackson

item.title: US-89/US-191/US-26/US-189 South At WY-22
item.description: US-89/US-191/US-26/US-189 South At WY-22 West to Wilson and Teton Village. Continue on US-89/US-191/US-189 South/US-26 West to Hoback Junction.

item.title: US-89/US-191/US-26/US-189 South At WY-22
item.description: US-89/US-191/US-26/US-189 South At WY-22 West to Wilson and Teton Village. Continue on US-89/US-191/US-189 South/US-26 West to Hoback Junction.

item.title: End WY-390 South at WY-22
item.description: End WY-390 south at WY-22. Turn left on WY-22 east for Jackson; left on WY-22 west for Wilson.

item.title: ID-33 East - WY-22 Closure Information
item.description: Teton Pass road closure information on ID-33 east approaching the Wyoming state line. When Teton Pass is closed in Wyoming, this is where the road closure starts, just inside of Idaho. All traffic must return to Victor Idaho when the road closure lights are flashing. This is one of the few instances in Idaho of a state highway shield from another state located inside Idaho.

item.title: WY-22 East at US-26/US-89/US-189/US-191
item.description: End WY-22 East at US-26/US-89/US-189/US-191. Use US-26 West/US-89/US-189/US-191 South to Hoback Junction.

item.title: WY-22 East approaching US-26/US-89/US-189/US-191
item.description: WY-22 East approaching US-26/US-89/US-189/US-191 in Jackson.

item.title: WY-22 East at WY-390
item.description: WY-22 east at WY-390 north to Teton Village. Continue east on WY-22 for Jackson.

item.title: WY-22 East Approaching WY-390
item.description: WY-22 east approaching WY-390 north to Teton Village Recreation Area.

item.title: US-89/US-191/US-26/US-189 South At WY-22
item.description: US-89/US-191/US-26/US-189 South At WY-22 West to Wilson and Teton Village. Continue on US-89/US-191/US-189 South/US-26 West to Hoback Junction.

item.title: US-26/US-89/US-191/US-189 at WY-22
item.description: US-26 East/US-89/US-191/US-189 North at WY-22 West to Wilson and Teton Village. Continue on US-26 East/US-89/US-191/US-189 North to Jackson, Teton National Park, and Yellowstone National Park.

item.title: US-89/US-191/US-26/US-189 North Approaching WY-22
item.description: US-26 East/US-89/US-191/US-189 North approaching WY-22 in Jackson.
